problem_text: If something is a deadly disease, then its survival rate is low. All severe cancers are deadly diseases. Bile duct cancer is a severe cancer. All Cholangiocarcinoma is bile duct cancer. No one with mild flu has a low survival rate. If colorectal cancer is a bile duct cancer and the survival rate is low, then colorectal cancer is not a bile duct cancer.
predicates:
DeadlyDisease(x) ::: x is a deadly disease.
LowSurvivalRate(x) ::: x has a low survival rate.
SevereCancer(x) ::: x is a severe cancer.
BileDuctCancer(x) ::: x is a bile duct cancer.
Cholangiocarcinoma(x) ::: x is Cholangiocarcinoma.
MildFlu(x) ::: x is mild flu.
ColorectalCancer(x) ::: x is colorectal cancer.
IsA(x, y) ::: x is a y.

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? If Cholangiocarcinoma is a deadly disease, then Cholangiocarcinoma has a low survival rate.
tests.conclusions: Cholangiocarcinoma → LowSurvivalRate(x) ::: Cholangiocarcinoma is a deadly disease, then Cholangiocarcinoma has a low survival rate. TRUE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? If Bile duct cancer has a low survival rate, then Bile duct cancer is a severe cancer.
tests.conclusions: LowSurvivalRate(bileductcancer) → SevereCancer(bileductcancer) ::: Bile duct cancer has a low survival rate if and only if it is a severe cancer. FALSE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? If Cholangiocarcinoma is a bile duct cancer and has a low survival rate, then it is a deadly disease.
Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? If Colorectal cancer is a bile duct cancer and has a low survival rate, then Colorectal cancer is a severe cancer.
tests.conclusions: IsA(colorectalCancer, SevereCancer) ::: Colorectal cancer is a severe cancer. FALSE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? If Cholangiocarcinoma is a severe cancer and it has a low survival rate, then Cholangiocarcinoma is a deadly disease.
Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? If Cholangiocarcinoma is a bile duct cancer, then it is a deadly disease.
Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? If Bile duct cancer is a deadly disease, then Bile duct cancer is a severe cancer.
Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? If Cholangiocarcinoma is a severe cancer and has a low survival rate, then it is a deadly disease.
tests.conclusions: IsA(cholangiocarcinoma, DeadlyDisease) ::: Cholangiocarcinoma is a deadly disease. FALSE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? If Bile duct cancer is a deadly disease, then Cholangiocarcinoma is a severe cancer.
Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? If Cholangiocarcinoma is a deadly disease and is also a severe cancer, then Cholangiocarcinoma is a bile duct cancer.
tests.conclusions: (IsA(cholangiocarcinoma, deadlydisease) ∧ IsA(cholangiocarcinoma, severecancer)) → IsA(cholangiocarcinoma, bileductcancer) ::: FALSE

candidate_solutions.text:
# Predicates:
DeadlyDisease(x) ::: x is a deadly disease.
LowSurvivalRate(x) ::: x has a low survival rate.
SevereCancer(x) ::: x is a severe cancer.
BileDuctCancer(x) ::: x is a bile duct cancer.
Cholangiocarcinoma(x) ::: x is Cholangiocarcinoma.
MildFlu(x) ::: x is mild flu.
ColorectalCancer(x) ::: x is colorectal cancer.
IsA(x, y) ::: x is a y.

# Premises:
∀x (DeadlyDisease(x) → LowSurvivalRate(x)) ::: If something is a deadly disease, then its survival rate is low.
∀x (SevereCancer(x) → DeadlyDisease(x)) ::: All severe cancers are deadly diseases.
IsA(bileDuctCancer, BileDuctCancer) ::: Bile duct cancer is a severe cancer.
∀x (Cholangiocarcinoma(x) → BileDuctCancer(x)) ::: All Cholangiocarcinoma is bile duct cancer.
∀x (MildFlu(x) → ¬LowSurvivalRate(x)) ::: No one with mild flu has a low survival rate.
IsA(colorectalCancer, BileDuctCancer) ∧ LowSurvivalRate(colorectalCancer) → ¬IsA(colorectalCancer, BileDuctCancer) ::: If colorectal cancer is a bile duct cancer and the survival rate is low, then colorectal cancer is not a bile duct cancer.
